statements: SELECT * FROM Feedback;
SELECT listener_name, rating FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_id, listener_name, comment, rating FROM Feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT listener_name, feedback_date FROM Feedback WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT listener_name, rating FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY rating ASC
SELECT SUM(rating) AS total_rating, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM Feedback
SELECT listener_name, COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM Feedback GROUP BY listener_name HAVING total_feedbacks > 2
SELECT feedback_id, comment FROM Feedback WHERE rating < 2 ORDER BY feedback_id
SELECT * FROM Feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_message, rating FROM Feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, listener_id, feedback_message FROM Feedback ORDER BY listener_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Comments WHERE feedback_id = 5;
SELECT comment_id, commenter_id, comment_text FROM Comments WHERE commenter_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_message, rating FROM Feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Feedback INNER JOIN Comments ON Feedback.feedback_id = Comments.feedback_id WHERE Comments.commenter_id = 1 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT listener_id, COUNT(*) as total_feedbacks FROM Feedback GROUP BY listener_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY total_feedbacks DESC;
SELECT comment_text FROM Comments WHERE comment_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY comment_id;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_message, rating FROM Feedback WHERE listener_id = 5 AND rating > 2 ORDER BY rating DESC, feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT listener_name, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE listener_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM music_production WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT production_name, producer_name, production_quality FROM music_production ORDER BY production_quality DESC;
SELECT customer_name, concern_text FROM customer_concerns WHERE resolution IS NULL;
SELECT feedback_id, listener_name, feedback_text, timestamp FROM feedback WHERE listener_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM music_production ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT production_name, producer_name, production_quality FROM music_production WHERE production_quality > 8;
SELECT * FROM customer_concerns WHERE resolution IS NULL;
SELECT customer_name, concern_text FROM customer_concerns ORDER BY concern_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Song;
SELECT title, artist, genre FROM Song ORDER BY artist DESC;
SELECT listener_id, name, email FROM Listener WHERE listener_id = 100;
SELECT id, listener_id, song_id, feedback_text, rating FROM Feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT id, customer_id, concern_text FROM CustomerConcerns WHERE resolved = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_text DESC
SELECT listener_id, COUNT(*) FROM Feedback GROUP BY listener_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT song_id, MAX(rating) FROM Feedback GROUP BY song_id HAVING MAX(rating) > 4
SELECT title, genre FROM Song WHERE artist LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY title ASC
SELECT * FROM CustomerConcerns WHERE resolved = false
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE listener_id = 1
SELECT track_name, artist_name, genre FROM music_tracks ORDER BY genre ASC
SELECT comment_text, comment_date FROM comments WHERE listener_id = 2
SELECT * FROM customer_concerns WHERE concern_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT listener_id, rating_value FROM ratings WHERE rated_entity_id = 3 ORDER BY rating_value DESC
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE listener_id = 123;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id = 5;
SELECT track_name, artist_name, genre FROM music_tracks WHERE track_duration > 180;
SELECT * FROM customer_concerns WHERE customer_id = 456 ORDER BY concern_date DESC;
SELECT comment_text, comment_date FROM comments WHERE listener_id = 789 AND comment_date > '2022-01-01';
